li.span: Text “Connect” to 951-406-4466 for more information.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: SIGN UP

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: SBK Youth and Family Services is a local Inland Empire community-based organization working with families to connect affordable home internet and other valuable services.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: With school systems across the US closing down in response to the coronavirus pandemic, Spectrum is offering free access to internet and WiFi for 60-days for new Pre-K to 12, college student and teacher households who don't currently have internet or WiFi service.This discount will be applied as a credit for your first two months of internet services. They will waive any installation or pre-payment fees to help get you started.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: You can qualify for this offer if you:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Have a student of qualifying age at your service address with remote education needs

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Have not subscribed to our internet services within the past 30 days

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: For more information, click

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Beginning Tuesday, March 24, seniors age 60+ and disabled persons in Moreno Valley will have some help supplementing their food supplies with the launch of a new City service called "

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: ." The free service, which provides both pick-up and delivery options, will offer a week's supply of mostly staples, such as beans, rice, or pasta and more.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Supplies will be available for drive-thru pick-up at the City's Conference & Recreation Center (CRC) at Alessandro Blvd. and Frederick St. Monday - Friday from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. the day after participants register. Delivery will take place on Tuesday and Thursday from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Participants must register either by phone at 951-413-3749 or email at MoValMeals@MoVal.org. Find more information at

strong.span: Art Connects - Virtual Student Arts Competition

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: In an effort to help students channel their creativity during mandatory school closures due to COVID-19, the Riverside County Office of Education has launched a virtual student arts competition open to all students in transitional kindergarten through 12th grade in Riverside County.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The competition is open to all students in grades TK-12 attending public, charter, private, parochial, or home school programs in Riverside County. For each of the six weeks, students can submit their contributions at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Winners will be announced in each grade level category approximately one week after the submission deadline for each week’s competition.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

p.span: Dear Parents:

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We hope you had a good weekend and are safe. As we head into what would have been our Spring Break, this is a good time to recharge. Below are some reminders, updates, and new resources.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: “Grab and Go” meals are still available during Spring Break at nearly all schools between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. As a reminder, students can go to any school. However, the following schools are no longer serving meals (nearby schools are listed as options).

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

p.span: The state will be waiving statewide testing this school year, as follows:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Suspending all California Assessment of Student Performance and Progress (CAASPP) testing.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: AP Exams will be offered for students to take remotely. Each exam will be 45 minutes.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Additional test information will be released on April 3.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Digital portfolio submission deadlines have been extended to May 26 at 11:59 p.m. EST.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Any students can cancel the exam at no charge.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Only units covered until early March will be covered on the exam.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Instructional resources will launch on 3/25/20--free remote learning resources.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: The online exam will be offered on two dates (TBD).

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

p.span: Residents can dial 2-1-1 at any time to hear the latest information about COVID-19. Callers are also able to get referrals for local services including food, shelter, and other health-related issues.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

p.span: Due to the extension of school closures, we have established a list of child care resources for parents who may need support during the school closure (see above). This has been updated recently.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

p.span: As our extended school closure progresses, we will continue to provide you with important information. However, we will send emails Monday, Wednesday, and Friday except for emergencies.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: and we will respond to you promptly.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your continued support,

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dr. Martinrex Kedziora

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear Parents:

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: What a week this has been! So many of you have been so gracious and thankful at our free meal service. On behalf of the Board of Education, thank you for all of your patience and support.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Next week, we will continue our “Grab and Go” meal program; however, we will be consolidating some of our meal pick-up locations.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please help us spread the word.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The following is a list of schools that will

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: no longer

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: be serving meals. Students can go to any MVUSD school, but we have listed nearby schools for your convenience.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Alessandro School, located at 23311 Dracaea Avenue.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: : Students can pick up meals at Badger Springs Middle School located at 24750 Delphinium Avenue.

strong.span: March Mountain and March Valley High Schools

li.span: : Students can go to Sunnymead Elementary located at 24050 Dracaea Avenue.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Due to the extension of school closures, we have established a list of child care resources for parents who may need support during the school closure. This will be updated continuously as information changes quickly.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

p.span: This crisis has already taken a great toll on many people’s employment. The California’s Employment Development Department has created a useful

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: with FAQs for people whose employment has been impacted by coronavirus (COVID-19). If you or someone you may know may need help, visit the site to find out eligibility and filing requirement for:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

p.span: Please continue to send your questions to “

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: ” and we will respond to you promptly.

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Have a safe weekend! Remember to wash your hands, practice social distancing, and only be in groups of less than 10 people. We care about you!!

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear Parents:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: During this unprecedented time with schools closed, the Board of Education and I want to assure you that we are doing all we can to keep your child safe and keep their educational progress on track.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Earlier this week, we posted a variety of grade-based independent learning and enrichment opportunities. As we head into what would have been our Spring Break, we wanted to remind you that you can access the website by visiting

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: (case-sensitive).

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Many parents have asked about homework packets or assignments. Our teachers care about your children very much and some of them may have provided assignments during the school closure. As we have previously mentioned, while we encourage all students and families to work together on independent learning and enrichment opportunities, at this time, assignments and resources are

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Due to the school closure extension through April 30, we are working diligently to identify educational resources and ensure students and families will have the ability to access the tools by April 13. We will provide you more information as soon as the details are finalized.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Tonight, you may have heard that Governor Gavin Newsom has issued a state-wide order for everyone to stay at home. Please know that this does not apply to our school meal program. Our district serves 33,000 students and today we served over 10,000 meals to our families.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We will continue to offer free meals tomorrow and throughout the school closure crisis. Now, more than ever, this serves as a vital service to our community. Please let your friends, neighbors, or anybody know that children and teens can pick up a free “Grab and Go” meal at any MVUSD school, Monday through Friday between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m., no questions asked.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We appreciate your patience and understanding. As you can imagine, this is not an easy undertaking for a district of nearly 40 schools and 33,000 students, and it is important that we get things done correctly, not just fast. Please continue to take care of yourselves. I appreciate all of your help in spreading the word about our meal program and online independent learning and enrichment opportunities.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.26; margin-right: 9pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span:
Dr. Martinrex Kedziora
Superintendent of Schools

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear families:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As you know,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: all schools in Riverside County have been ordered

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to close through April 30, 2020, which includes our previously scheduled spring break, March 23 - April 3, 2020. In an effort to support our students and community, the Board of Education and I have decided to extend our “Grab and Go” meal service throughout the duration of this unprecedented crisis.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Lunch will be available to all children and teens Monday through Friday from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at all K-12 Moreno Valley Unified Schools. Under current state requirements, students must be present to receive a “Grab and Go” meal, which includes lunch and breakfast items for the following morning. Please keep an eye out for a business card in your “Grab and Go” lunch bag that contains information regarding independent learning and enrichment opportunities.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Additionally, we are working with our community partners to establish a list of child care resources for parents who may need support during the school closure.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We hope you share all of this information with your friends and family to ensure all families who may need this service are informed. We will continue to keep you updated as appropriate, and would love your support in spreading the word!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: If you have any questions in the meantime, please continue to send your questions to “

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: ” and we will respond as soon as we can.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your continued support.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Sincerely,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dr. Martinrex Kedziora

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Superintendent of Schools

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
span.br: Dear parents, staff and community members:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Today, the Riverside County Public Health Officer Dr. Cameron Kaiser announced an order to extend all school closures in the county through April 30, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Later today, we expect additional information and guidance from the California State Department of Education and Governor Gavin Newsom regarding school closures. We understand that this is disconcerting and you want information as soon as possible. We are working with our local and state officials to get the most accurate information.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please continue to monitor your emails for updates. On behalf of the Board of Education and I, thank you for your flexibility and understanding during this rapidly changing situation.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Sincerely,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dr. Martinrex Kedziora

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Superintendent of Schools

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear Parents:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: During this challenging time with schools closed, the Board of Education and I feel it’s important to remember to take care of each other. We know that it can be difficult for many families and we want to remind you of a few resources available for your students.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: First, we are providing students a “Grab and Go” lunch and breakfast option this week between 11:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. at all schools with exception to Rainbow Springs. You may visit

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: school with your child, no questions asked.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: In addition, to continue supporting our MVUSD students' educational needs, we have compiled a list of various online educational resources in preparation for the possibility of school closures. You may access the website by visiting

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: (case-sensitive) or scanning the QR Code in the attached email.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: While the Moreno Valley Unified School District encourages all students and families to work together on independent learning and enrichment opportunities, these are optional and students are not required to submit work to teachers.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The earliest students can return to classes is Monday, April 6. However, the federal and local recommendations are changing daily. If we need to extend our school closure period, the dates will be adjusted and we will let you know as soon as possible.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Nunito,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 200; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Good evening,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: School lunch meals and a breakfast item will continue to be provided at no cost for all Moreno Valley Unified School District students during the school closure of March 16, 2020 through March 20, 2020 between 11:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Meals will be provided as a “Grab and Go” option at all MVUSD schools with exception to Rainbow Springs. If you have children attending different MVUSD school sites, you can visit the nearest school site to receive meals.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Children must be present in order for meals to be provided. If you have any questions, please email “

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Moreno Valley Unified School District

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear parents:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: On behalf of the Board of Education and I, thank you for your patience as we and all schools throughout California work to respond as quickly as possible to a rapidly evolving issue with the best information we have from expert agencies.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As you know, we have been in regular communication with the Riverside University Health Systems-Public Health (RUHS-PH) to learn about the latest news regarding the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). There are no known confirmed cases by public health officials of COVID-19 among our students or staff in the Moreno Valley Unified School District. However, we have been taking precautionary measures and have been preparing for the possibility of school closures if necessary.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Today, the Riverside County Public Health Officer Dr. Cameron Kaiser

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

a.span: ordered the closure of all schools in the county

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Effective Monday, March 16, 2020 we will close all Moreno Valley Unified School District schools through Spring Break.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: School will resume on Monday, April 6, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please keep in mind that school closures could be extended based on the rapidly changing situation.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We understand this is a very difficult situation for many of our families and staff because schools serve as a lifeline for many. The District Office will remain open to ensure the continuation of critical functions. Lunch meals will continue to be provided for families as a “Grab and Go” option during March 16, 2020 through March 20, 2020 between 11:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. at all schools.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our top priority is the health and safety of our students, staff, families and community members. Please know that during this closure, public health officials continue to recommend for everyone to practice social distancing and take everyday preventive actions to avoid spreading germs and illnesses. As we have mentioned in previous communications, please follow these important tips:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Children who have fevers and coughs or any other flu-like symptoms should stay home until they are symptom-free for 24 hours without medication.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash. If you don't have a tissue, cough or sneeze into your upper sleeve, not your hands.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Individuals with chronic health issues and/or individuals experiencing severe symptoms should be evaluated by a medical professional.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: To stay informed of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), please continue to check the following credible sources:

li.style: list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: or call 2-1-1

li.style: list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
span.br: We will remain in close contact with local public health officials throughout the duration of this closure and will provide updates as appropriate. Please check our website “

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: ” for additional information and resources.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your patience and support,

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span:
Dr. Martinrex Kedziora
Superintendent of Schools

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 9pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left
line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 9pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 9pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear Parents, Staff and Community Members:

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This is an understandably challenging time and we appreciate your ongoing support and collaboration to keep our community safe. The Board of Education and I continue to monitor the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) closely alongside local and state officials. There are

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: known confirmed cases of COVID-19 among our students or staff in the Moreno Valley Unified School District.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your patience as we and all schools throughout California work to respond as quickly as possible to a rapidly evolving issue with the best information we have from expert agencies.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Late last night, the Office of the Governor directed public agencies to follow

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: including restrictions on public events and large gatherings to reduce the spread of COVID-19 and protect community health. Today, the Riverside County Public Health Department issued a

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: with additional information on the cancellation of large events.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As you know, we were already taking preventative measures to consider postponing, cancelling, or modifying events and activities on our campuses prior to these announcements, including making the decision to postpone open houses.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The Board of Education and I are announcing the additional steps we are taking based on the directive from Governor Gavin Newsom and the Riverside County Public Health Department. By order of the Health Officer of the County of Riverside, all events with expected attendance above 250 individuals are cancelled starting March 12, 2020 until April 30, 2020, regardless of venue. The following additional decisions and guidelines were made in consultation and in consideration of their recommendations and orders.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Students with symptoms of illness will be assessed by a health care staff member and may be sent home.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Students sent home must be picked up by a parent or person on their emergency contact list.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: A student with a fever and respiratory illness symptoms will be isolated until they are able to leave.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Students will continue to receive reminders about best practices for preventing the spread of the germs and viruses.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 9pt; margin-bottom: 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Employees with symptoms of illness consult with a healthcare professional.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Following the recommendation of public health officials, please call your doctor instead of walking in.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Employees with a fever and respiratory illness symptoms are asked to stay home until fully recovered and symptom-free for 24 hours including being free of a fever without the use of fever-reducing medicines.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; background-color: #ffffff; margin-top: 9pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 9pt; text-align: left

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: As a reminder, it is essential that anyone who is sick stays home until fully recovered and symptom-free for 24 hours including being free of a fever without the use of fever-reducing medicines.

strong.span: All of these measures will be in effect through April 6, 2020 (through Spring Break) and will be modified or extended based on guidance from public health officials.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are continuously communicating with the Riverside County Department of Public Health and are staying updated on any new developments regarding this rapidly changing situation. All of these decisions are not taken lightly. Our top priority is the health and safety of our students, staff, families and community members. We expect new precautions daily and will continue to update you as soon as we are informed.
